name: SyncRobot
description:
Keyboard Controls:

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move.

Press X to restart the level.

Use B to rewind Blue and R to rewind Red.

Press Backspace to Pause on web, or Escape on computer.

Controller:

Use Left Joystick or D-Pad to move.

Press Triangle / Y to restart.

Use Square / X to rewind Blue and Circle / B to rewind Red.

Press Options / Start to pause.

Credits:

Uses Godot Engine (godotengine.org/license)

Art by Lisa and JoAnne

Audio used with permission from Kenney.nl

Rewind sound from Casette by Shapeform Audio
